name: zig-node-native-module
description: Example of a Node.js module written in Zig

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && ZIG_SYSTEM_LINKER_HACK=1 zig build-lib -mcpu=baseline -OReleaseSmall -dynamic -lc -isystem deps/node-$(node --version)/include/node src/lib.zig -fallow-shlib-undefined -femit-bin=dist/lib.node

author: Andre 'Staltz' Medeiros <contact@staltz.com>
